analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/29/0x0d00fd58ea71bac05b307d46c7ab389b29219a8f.sol:
	Contract PhipsiToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/29/0x0d00fd58ea71bac05b307d46c7ab389b29219a8f.sol#209)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/29/0x0d00fd58ea71bac05b307d46c7ab389b29219a8f.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/29/0x0d00fd58ea71bac05b307d46c7ab389b29219a8f.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/29/0x0d00fd58ea71bac05b307d46c7ab389b29219a8f.sol#74-75) is not in mixedCase
